name: Shuttle Launch (Three Flags Games)
description:
Welcome to Shuttle Launch!

Choose three to six sleepy astronauts and let's begin! Can you get them to mission control before the shuttle to Mars launches?

There are three types of cards. The cards with an hourglass or a question mark must be played before the cards with a color circle.

The hourglass card will advance time one space. Once the time bar fills up -- game over! The question mark card will randomize the board. And the color card will advance the chosen astronaut to the next open space of that color (or mission control)! Choose wisely.

Although this is a two player game, players are encouraged to work together.

Good luck! 🍀

* * *

This game is built using the Love2d framework and was inspired by Hoot Owl Hoot.
All emojis designed by OpenMoji – the open-source emoji and icon project. License: CC BY-SA 4.0
